title: 7 Days Machame Route
metaTitle: 7 Days Machame Route | Kilimanjaro Climb | Snow Africa Adventure
metaDescription: Climb Kilimanjaro via the scenic 7-day Machame Route. Known as the 'Whiskey Route' with 90% success rate. Expert guides, all-inclusive packages.
overview: The Machame Route, also known as the 'Whiskey Route', is one of the most scenic and popular routes on Kilimanjaro. This 7-day itinerary provides excellent acclimatization through a 'climb high, sleep low' profile, giving you the best chance of reaching Uhuru Peak at 5,895m.
highlights: Stunning views of Kibo and Mawenzi peaks
inclusions: 2 nights hotel in Moshi (pre and post trek)

title: 8 Days Lemosho Route
metaTitle: 8 Days Lemosho Route | Kilimanjaro | Snow Africa Adventure
metaDescription: The Lemosho Route offers the highest success rate on Kilimanjaro. 8-day trek through pristine wilderness with excellent acclimatization.
overview: The Lemosho Route is widely considered the most beautiful and remote route on Kilimanjaro. Starting from the western Londorossi Gate, you'll traverse the entire mountain through pristine wilderness before reaching Uhuru Peak.

title: 6 Days Marangu Route
metaTitle: 6 Days Marangu Route | Kilimanjaro | Snow Africa Adventure
metaDescription: The classic 'Coca-Cola Route' with hut accommodation. 6-day Kilimanjaro trek suitable for beginners.
overview: The Marangu Route, nicknamed the 'Coca-Cola Route', is the oldest and most established route on Kilimanjaro. It's the only route offering hut accommodation with beds, making it popular for those who prefer more comfort.

title: 5 Days Marangu Route
metaTitle: 5 Days Marangu Route | Quick Kilimanjaro Climb
metaDescription: Shortest route to Kilimanjaro summit. 5-day Marangu trek with hut accommodation. For fit and experienced trekkers.
overview: The 5-day Marangu Route is the shortest option for climbing Kilimanjaro. Due to limited acclimatization time, this route is only recommended for very fit and experienced trekkers.

title: 6 Days Rongai Route
metaTitle: 6 Days Rongai Route | Kilimanjaro North | Snow Africa
metaDescription: Climb Kilimanjaro from the quiet northern side. 6-day Rongai Route offers less crowds and unique perspectives.
overview: The Rongai Route approaches Kilimanjaro from the north, near the Kenyan border. This less-traveled route offers a wilderness experience with fewer crowds and unique views of the mountain.

title: 7 Days Rongai Route
metaTitle: 7 Days Rongai Route | Extended Kilimanjaro Trek
metaDescription: Extended 7-day Rongai Route for better acclimatization. Approach from the quiet northern side of Kilimanjaro.
overview: The 7-day Rongai Route adds an extra acclimatization day compared to the standard 6-day version, significantly improving your chances of summit success.
highlights: Higher success rate with extra day

title: 6 Days Machame Route
metaTitle: 6 Days Machame Route | Quick Whiskey Route
metaDescription: Shorter 6-day version of the popular Machame Route. Scenic climb for experienced trekkers.
overview: The 6-day Machame Route is a shorter version of the popular 'Whiskey Route'. This condensed itinerary is best suited for fit trekkers with previous high-altitude experience.

title: 6 Days Umbwe Route
metaTitle: 6 Days Umbwe Route | Most Challenging Kilimanjaro Route
metaDescription: The Umbwe Route is the most direct and challenging path to Kilimanjaro summit. For experienced high-altitude trekkers only.
overview: The Umbwe Route is the most challenging and direct route on Kilimanjaro. It's steep, demanding, and offers minimal acclimatization time. Only recommended for experienced high-altitude trekkers.

title: 4 Days Mount Meru Climbing
metaTitle: Mount Meru Climb 4 Days | Tanzania's Second Highest Peak
metaDescription: Climb Mount Meru (4,566m) in 4 days. Perfect acclimatization for Kilimanjaro or standalone adventure.
overview: Mount Meru is Tanzania's second-highest peak at 4,566m and offers excellent preparation for Kilimanjaro. Located in Arusha National Park, the climb features stunning views and wildlife encounters.

title: 3 Days 2 Nights Ol Doinyo Lengai Climbing
metaTitle: Ol Doinyo Lengai Climb | Mountain of God | Snow Africa
metaDescription: Climb Ol Doinyo Lengai, the only active volcano in Tanzania. 3-day adventure to the 'Mountain of God'.
overview: Ol Doinyo Lengai, meaning 'Mountain of God' in Maasai, is Tanzania's only active volcano. This challenging night climb rewards you with sunrise views from the crater rim at 2,962m.
